welcome_message: We're glad to have you here! VolleyTrack aims to be more than just a platform; we're a community dedicated to transforming the way we organize and manage volleyball teams and training.
text_early_access: Be among the first to try out the features of our alpha version.
text_exclusive_discounts: Users who help us in the initial phase will be rewarded with discounts on future subscriptions.
text_have_your_voice_heard: Use our feedback channel to suggest improvements and new features.
text_security_and_development: Your data is safe with us. We follow all LGPD guidelines, and your privacy is our top priority.
text_development: Our development team is constantly working to keep the system secure and free from vulnerabilities.
placeholder_message: This message will be manually reviewed by our team to assess if you match our ideal customer profile. Based on it, your access to the platform may be approved or denied.
answer_1: - VolleyTrack is a developing platform aimed at simplifying the process of organizing volleyball teams and training. We are currently in the alpha phase and invite you to join us on this journey.
question_2: How can I register for VolleyTrack?
answer_2: - During this initial development phase, you can register by providing basic information. Our support team will contact you to provide initial access to your account.
question_3: What are the limitations of the basic version?
answer_3: - The basic version of the system is limited by the number of players and teams you can register. This rule may change as we validate the product with our customers.
question_4: How can I provide feedback on the product?
answer_4: - We highly value user feedback. We have a Discord channel where you can discuss ideas and issues directly with the development team and other users.
question_5: How long does it take to receive support?
answer_5: - Our support team is available from Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM. Our goal is to respond to all support requests within 48 hours.
answer_6: - Currently, we do not have a mobile app. However, VolleyTrack is fully responsive and can be accessed from any device. Depending on user needs and feedback, this may change in the future.
question_7: How can I cancel my subscription?
answer_7: - You can cancel your subscription at any time. Just contact our support team, and they will take care of it for you.
question_8: Is there a community where I can interact with other users?
answer_8: - Yes, we have an active community on Discord, where you can interact with other users and the VolleyTrack team. This space is perfect for discussions, idea sharing, and even reporting issues you may encounter.
question_9: How can I report bugs or technical issues?
answer_9: - If you encounter any bugs or face technical issues, the quickest way to report is through our Discord support channel. We also accept bug reports via our support email suporte@volleytrack.com. For faster service, you can open an issue directly on the project's GitHub, which will likely be addressed more immediately by our development team.
question_10: How will VolleyTrack be developed in the future?
answer_10: - VolleyTrack is an open-source project, and we are always open to new ideas and suggestions. You can follow the project's development on our GitHub. If you are a developer, you can contribute to the project by submitting a pull request.
welcome_message_index: Discover the freedom of managing your volleyball team with efficiency and ease. VolleyTrack is the ultimate solution for coaches, players, and organizers looking to elevate their team's level. With our intuitive platform, you can organize games, practices, and manage your roster with just a few clicks.
welcome_title_index: The Revolution in Volleyball Team Management
text_smart_scheduling: With our advanced calendar system, planning games and practices has never been easier. Set specific fundamentals for each session, detail the technical focus, and make personalized notes to ensure every practice is productive and aligned with the team's goals.
text_complete_team_management: Centralize player information, including statistics, frequency, and individual progress. Our system allows for detailed control of attendance and performance, as well as providing a space for critical notes and observations that aid in the continuous development of athletes.
text_detaile_analysis_and_statistics: Turn data into insights with our detailed reports. Monitor player growth and team evolution through in-depth analyses, helping to make informed decisions and structure more effective training sessions.
text_efficient_and_targeted_communicatio: Ensure everyone is on the same page with real-time updates and clear communication. Inform about upcoming practices, strategy changes, and news, keeping the team united and focused on constant improvement of collective performance.
text_footer_about_us: VolleyTrack is a project developed with passion and innovation in Brazil. We are committed to software excellence and believe in the power of open source to create robust and reliable solutions. Our system is an open platform that invites developers to collaborate and innovate in the world of volleyball.
hero_top_text: TAKE YOUR TEAM TO THE NEXT LEVEL WITH VOLLEYTRACK
hero_title_main: Smart platform for training, athletes and volleyball performance management
hero_desc_text: Everything coaches and managers need to plan, track and evolve teams with data, organization and technology in one place.
benefits_subtitle: The system brings practical resources for the daily life of coaches and clubs — more organization, data and results, less complexity.
benefit_card_desc_smart_scheduling: Schedule training and appointments in a few clicks. Receive automatic reminders and keep everyone informed.
benefit_card_desc_team_management: Organize players, set up teams, define roles and track the technical performance of each athlete.
benefit_card_desc_analysis: View graphs, reports and performance history to make the best decisions for the team.
benefit_card_desc_communication: Send notices, messages and feedback to teams or players quickly and segmented.
about_text: VolleyTrack was born to simplify the life of volleyball coaches. With it, you organize your team, plan training, record attendance and technical performance with a few clicks.
plans_title: Choose the ideal plan for your team
plans_subtitle: Start free, evolve as your team grows and pay only for what you need.
plan_card_trial_warning: Automatic email 3 days before the end
